trans-unit.target: 提供事件架構控制流程模型。

trans-unit.source: This activity behaves similarly to <xref:System.Activities.Statements.Switch%601> in that it executes only one of several activities in response to events.
trans-unit.target: 這個活動的行為類似於 <xref:System.Activities.Statements.Switch%601>，因為它只會執行多個活動中的其中一個來回應事件。

trans-unit.source: The action chosen to be executed is defined by an event, chosen from a set of events.
trans-unit.target: 選擇要執行的動作是由從一組事件中選擇的事件所定義。

trans-unit.source: The following code sample demonstrates creating a <xref:System.Activities.Statements.Pick> activity.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例將示範如何建立 <xref:System.Activities.Statements.Pick> 活動。

trans-unit.source: This example is from the [Using the Pick Activity](~/docs/framework/windows-workflow-foundation/samples/using-the-pick-activity.md) sample.
trans-unit.target: 這個範例取自[使用 Pick 活動](~/docs/framework/windows-workflow-foundation/samples/using-the-pick-activity.md)範例。

trans-unit.target: 建立 <see cref="T:System.Activities.Statements.Pick" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The collection of <see cref="T:System.Activities.Statements.PickBranch" /> objects that the <see cref="T:System.Activities.Statements.Pick" /> activity potentially executes one of, based on incoming events.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Activities.Statements.PickBranch" /> 物件的集合，<see cref="T:System.Activities.Statements.Pick" /> 活動可能會根據傳入事件執行其中一個物件。

trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例將示範如何設定 <xref:System.Activities.Statements.Pick> 活動的 Branches 屬性。
